paragraphs.text:
%md

### Saphron Open Data: Sample notebook on Eng-Fil stopwords and bigrams/trigrams

This notebook is part of the nan.ai English-Filipino Corpus Open Data. This is a sample of the pre-processing work we use for the chatbot. With this notebook, we also created derived datasets you can easily use for your NLP exercises (just access it via S3). You can load the data via S3 or download it and change to a local path.

Join the discussion [here](https://github.com/Saphron-Asia/nan.ai-opendata-corpus/discussions).

msg.data:
Saphron Open Data: Sample notebook on Eng-Fil stopwords and bigrams/trigrams

This notebook is part of the nan.ai English-Filipino Corpus Open Data. This is a sample of the pre-processing work we use for the chatbot. With this notebook, we also created derived datasets you can easily use for your NLP exercises (just access it via S3). You can load the data via S3 or download it and change to a local path.

Join the discussion here.

paragraphs.title: Installing Needed Libraries
paragraphs.text:
%sh

pip3 install pandas
pip3 install nltk
pip3 install boto3
pip3 install advertools

paragraphs.title: Importing Needed Packages
paragraphs.text:
%python
import boto3
import pandas as pd
import io
import sys
import csv
from nltk.corpus import stopwords 
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize 
import re

paragraphs.title: Set-Up S3 using Boto3
paragraphs.text:
%python

client = boto3.client('s3',
     aws_access_key_id=" ",
     aws_secret_access_key=" ",
     region_name=" ") # Add access ID and secret key to pull data from S3

paragraphs.title: Loading Data to Notebook
paragraphs.text:
%python

obj = client.get_object(Bucket = 'raw-data-chatbot', Key = "corpus/Filipino-English/News/news_pilipino_star_ngayon.csv")

df = pd.read_csv(obj['Body'])

print(df)

paragraphs.title: Import NLTK for NLP
paragraphs.text:
%python

import nltk
nltk.download('stopwords')
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
stopwords.fileids()

paragraphs.text:

 'lang',
 'mo',
 'naman',
 'opo',
 'po',

 'yan',

 'di',
 'nga',
 'ni',
 'muna',
 'munang',
 'maari',
 'maaring',
 'magkaroon', #Adding translated stop words
 'matapos',
 'mahigit',
 'sandaling',
 'higit',
 'ilang',
 'naturang',
 'magkaroong',
 'noong',
 'talagang',
 'parehong',
 'pumuntang',
 'pumupuntang',
 'saang',
 'sabing',
 'sabihing',
 'pang'
 'kc', #Adding text language for filipino
 'd2',
 'dn'
 'hndi',
 'hnd',
 'i2',
 'tau',
 'dto',
 'satin',
 'der',
 'ngaun',
 'senyo',
 'cla',
 'cna',
 'k',
 'q',
 'qng',
 'kng']
 
stopper.extend(tl_add)

paragraphs.title: Data Cleaning
paragraphs.text:
%python

df = df.astype(str)
df.columns
df = df.rename(columns={' Article': 'Article'})
print(df['Article'])

paragraphs.title: Removing Tagalog Stopwords from News Data
paragraphs.text:
%python

df['Article'] = df['Article'].str.replace('[^\w\s]','')
df['Article'] = df['Article'].str.lower().str.split()
df['Article'] = df['Article'].apply(lambda x: [item for item in x if item not in stopper])

paragraphs.title: Removing English Stopwords from News Data
paragraphs.text:
%python

import advertools as adv

stopper1 = sorted(adv.stopwords['english'])
df['Article'] = df['Article'].apply(lambda x: [item for item in x if item not in stopper1])

print(df.Article[49])

paragraphs.title: Stoplist to DF

df3 = pd.DataFrame({'Stoplist_TL': stopper})

paragraphs.title: Tagalog Stoplist DF to s3
paragraphs.text:
%python

with io.StringIO() as csv_buffer:
    df3.to_csv(csv_buffer, index=False)

    response = client.put_object(
        Bucket="saphron-opendata-nlp", Key="Stoplist/Stoplist_TL.csv", Body=csv_buffer.getvalue()
    )

    status = response.get("ResponseMetadata", {}).get("HTTPStatusCode")

    if status == 200:
        print(f"Successful S3 put_object response. Status - {status}")
    else:
        print(f"Unsuccessful S3 put_object response. Status - {status}")

msg.data: Successful S3 put_object response. Status - 200

paragraphs.title: Wattpad data
paragraphs.text:
%python

import re
from io import BytesIO
import zipfile
import os
from io import StringIO
from collections import Counter

%python

obj1 = client.get_object(Bucket = 'raw-data-chatbot', Key = "corpus/Filipino-English/Wattpad/Wattpad-20210418T110536Z-001.zip")

%python

import zipfile
buffer = io.BytesIO(obj1['Body'].read())
zf = zipfile.ZipFile(buffer)
fnames = zf.namelist()
dfw = [ ]
for fname in fnames:
    if zf.getinfo(fname).filename.endswith('.txt'):
        title=zf.extract(fname)
        #print(title)
        data = zf.read(fname).decode("utf-8")
        data1 = StringIO(data)
        dfw.append(pd.DataFrame(data1, columns=['data']))

%python

dfw1 = pd.concat(dfw)
dfw1['data'] = dfw1['data'].str.replace('[^\w\s]','')
dfw1['data'] = dfw1['data'].str.lower().str.split()
dfw1['data'] = dfw1['data'].apply(lambda x: [item for item in x if item not in stopper])
dfw1['data'] = dfw1['data'].apply(lambda x: [item for item in x if item not in stopper1])
dfw1 = dfw1[dfw1.astype(str)['data'] != '[]']

%python

print(dfw1)

paragraphs.title: Create Taglish N-Grams
paragraphs.text:
%python

from nltk.util import ngrams

ndf['bigrams'] = ndf['data'].apply(lambda row: list(nltk.ngrams(row, 2)))
ndf['trigrams'] = ndf['data'].apply(lambda row: list(nltk.ngrams(row, 3)))

%python
print(ndf)

tgm = ndf.trigrams.explode()
ndf2 = pd.DataFrame(tgm)
ndf2 = ndf2.value_counts().rename_axis('Words').reset_index(name='counts')
print(ndf2)

paragraphs.title: Taglish Bigrams to s3
paragraphs.text:
%python

with io.StringIO() as csv_buffer:
    ndf1.to_csv(csv_buffer, index=False)

    response = client.put_object(
        Bucket="saphron-opendata-nlp", Key="Stoplist/Bigrams_Taglish.csv", Body=csv_buffer.getvalue()
    )

    status = response.get("ResponseMetadata", {}).get("HTTPStatusCode")

    if status == 200:
        print(f"Successful S3 put_object response. Status - {status}")
    else:
        print(f"Unsuccessful S3 put_object response. Status - {status}")

msg.data: Successful S3 put_object response. Status - 200
